about_the_game:
Relencost is a world ravaged by ancient conflict. The surface has been rendered unlivable by a permanent chaotic magical storm.
The survivors in this post apocalyptic world have ascended above the cloud layer, finding safety upon the tallest mountain peaks and the floating islands scattered around the world.

One place remains treacherous above all others: The Stormwall.

A place so dangerous that it's shifting depths are rarely explored and only the bravest or most greedy dare to travel.

Each day, a new safe passage will shift into being, opening or closing the path to different locations.




You and your colleagues will delve into the depths of The Stormwall, locating and retrieving lost treasures from Pre-War Relencost while completing contracts from the Ranadeen Empire.
You'll use numerous tools and gadgets to increase your odds of survival, and more importantly: Loot. You will use your hard earned wealth to upgrade your ship allowing you to move deeper into the storm for greater rewards and precious Skystones.

*Sail over chasms with the Glider

*Reach untold heights with the Grapple pack

*Use your hard earned gold to purchase new and more powerful tools in the supply outpost.

*Unlock permanent character upgrades with Skystones given as rewards for completing the Ranadeen salvage contracts.




Gather your fellow Stormtreaders and work together to survive The Stormwall.
Ancient locations are filled with terrible enemies intent on making each trip your last.
Keep your eyes peeled and your wits sharp to get your loot back to the ship.



Move quickly as activity inside of the storm wall attracts the unwanted attention of Mighty Goliath's called Stormbeasts.
Few things can survive a direct conflict with a stormbeast, so make sure that you, your ship, and your goods have left before they show up.




**Features**

*Procedurally Generated Maps, Dungeons, and Events for infinite replayability

*Permanent Character progression

*Proximity Voice Chat

*Co-Op Multiplayer

*Dozens of Unique Pieces of Equipment

name: Skyward Extraction

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7400 @3.00ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Gforce 1080ti
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A light horror roguelike adventure through a post apocalyptic world, with airships.
